Customers

ID Name Address TotalOrderedCost OrdersCount
{{customer.id}} {{customer.customerName}} {{customer.address}} {{customer.totalOrderedCost}} {{customer.ordersCount}}
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'customers', templateUrl: './customers.component.html' }) export class CustomersComponent { public customers: Customer[] = []; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + 'customers').subscribe(result => { this.customers = result; console.log(result); }, error => console.error(error)); } } interface Customer { id: number, customerName: string, address: string, totalOrderedCost: number, ordersCount: number }
